scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-js & npm run bundle-js-example
scripts.bundle-js: browserify src/js/app.js --transform babelify -t [ browserify-css --autoInject=true ] --global-transform [ uglifyify --no-sourcemap --compress [ --drop_console --unused --dead_code ] ] --outfile build/js/bundle.js
scripts.bundle-js-example: browserify examples/instagram/js/app.js --transform babelify -t [ browserify-css --autoInject=true ] --global-transform [ uglifyify --no-sourcemap --compress [ --drop_console --unused --dead_code ] ] --outfile examples/instagram/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-js-example
